rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious foyer with a welcoming Bohemian style decor and natural lighting. Incorporates local materials, earthy tones and art installations.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Larger living area with a cozy yet open design, featuring Bohemian furniture and decorative elements. Vastu compliant layout aligning east-west axis.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Separate dining area adjacent to the living room with Bohemian aesthetics and an emphasis on natural light.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Open-plan kitchen integrated with dining area to encourage family interaction. Uses local materials and maintains a Bohemian style.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Compact living area for the domestic help with essential facilities. Designed to be discreet and functional.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace designed for a professional setting with privacy. Equipped with modern amenities and a Bohemian artistic touch.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: Small guest bathroom designed to maintain privacy and convenience.

openings.description: Large door with decorative features aligning with Bohemian aesthetics.

openings.location: Throughout the ground floor for natural light and ventilation.
openings.description: Various sized windows placed strategically to maximize light.
Provides an outdoor seating area and fresh air, designed in a Bohemian style.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with ample natural light and ventilation. Designed using Vastu principles for optimum energy flow.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom designed for children or guests, incorporating a Bohemian aesthetic with functional layouts.

rooms.name: ensuite bathroom
rooms.description: Integrated bathroom designed for the master bedroom. Emphasis on privacy and functionality.

rooms.name: Storage Closet
rooms.description: Utility space for storing personal belongings and household items.

openings.location: Various positions on the upper floor to ensure balanced lighting
openings.description: Strategically placed for maximum light and cross ventilation.
Provides additional outdoor space with a view of the surrounding garden.
